name: BrainWave Generator Audio File
summary: Learn about .BWG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BWG files can be converted to .WAV files using BrainWave Generator. Open your binaural beat, choose Wave â†’ Play Into WAV File..., and then choose your output location.
NOTE: The BWG software was last updated in 2005.

description: Audio file used by BrainWave Generator (BWG), a program that uses sound and visual stimulation to try and help users relax, meditate, and focus better; saves audio in the form of a "binaural beat," which attempts to change brain frequencies toward a desired state.
